title: cmd/gc: odd error message for "imported and not used" error of dot-import
body:
The following program

http://play.golang.org/p/fgq-vS1Pem

compiles as expected in the http://play.golang.org/ playground (with a presumably older
compiler) and reports:

prog.go:3: imported and not used: "fmt"

The same program compiled on the command line with the compiler at tip reports:

go tool 6g a.go
a.go:3: imported and not used: "fmt" as Sscanln

The "as Sscanln" appears to be some newly printed dregg.

(go version devel +84975e4930dd Tue Sep 17 18:06:58 2013 -0700 darwin/amd64)
